scripts.prestart: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const os=require('os');const interfaces=os.networkInterfaces();let wifiIP='192.168.1.100';for(const name in interfaces){for(const net of interfaces[name]){if(net.family==='IPv4'&&!net.internal){if(name.toLowerCase().includes('wi-fi')||name.toLowerCase().includes('wlan')){wifiIP=net.address;break}}}}fs.writeFileSync('.env.local','EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://'+wifiIP+':4000','utf8');process.env.EXPO_PACKAGER_PROXY_URL='http://'+wifiIP+':8081';process.env.REACT_NATIVE_PACKAGER_HOSTNAME=wifiIP;console.log('✅ IP automática:',wifiIP)"
scripts.preandroid: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const os=require('os');const interfaces=os.networkInterfaces();let wifiIP='192.168.1.100';for(const name in interfaces){for(const net of interfaces[name]){if(net.family==='IPv4'&&!net.internal){if(name.toLowerCase().includes('wi-fi')||name.toLowerCase().includes('wlan')){wifiIP=net.address;break}}}}fs.writeFileSync('.env.local','EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://'+wifiIP+':4000','utf8');process.env.EXPO_PACKAGER_PROXY_URL='http://'+wifiIP+':8081';process.env.REACT_NATIVE_PACKAGER_HOSTNAME=wifiIP;console.log('✅ IP automática:',wifiIP)"
